constraints.name: query_count_constraint
constraints.description: 查询次数上限为 n+1 次

constraints.name: node_value_constraint
constraints.description: 数组元素的取值范围为 [0, n-1]
constraints.formal: 0 <= a[i] < n for all i in [0, n-1]

constraints.name: parallel_operation
constraints.description: 交互器是非自适应的，即数组在查询过程中不会改变
constraints.formal: a is fixed throughout the queries

constraints.name: query_count_constraint
constraints.description: 如果查询无效或超过查询次数，返回 -1 并终止程序
constraints.formal: if invalid query or queries > n + 1, return -1 and terminate

result.description: 构造一个满足条件的数组

result.name: optimal_substructure
result.description: 最优子结构：通过查询子区间的信息，可以逐步推导出整个数组的值。每个子问题的解是整个问题解的一部分。
